Package edu.memphis.ccrg.lida.framework.gui

Contains classes related to the framework's GUI and GUI controller.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
FrameworkGuiController Controller for the FrameworkGui.
 

Class Summary
FrameworkGui The main GUI for the LIDA framework.
FrameworkGuiControllerImpl Default Implementation of FrameworkGuiController
FrameworkGuiFactory For specific agent implementations, create a main class simply need call this class's start method with particular parameters for that agent: Agent instance and a Properties.
 

Package edu.memphis.ccrg.lida.framework.gui Description

Contains classes related to the framework's GUI and GUI controller.
